text: Had been long a relationship working with Pharmedley company, very satisfying with their local and internationally engineering support and all equipment related detail provided. Further more, they are also a good advisor when come to after sales service and the most important thing is they respond promptly to urgent request. Cheers.

We have had an excellent experience working with Pharmadley Pte Ltd for our supply containment equipment and engineering solutions. Their expertise, attention to detail, and commitment to quality exceeded our expectations. The equipment provided was of top-tier quality, meeting all regulatory requirements.

Pharmadley is very well-established in Singapore after sell support is very good. They had quite a few well known brands , worked with zyan and Christian will recommend them.Christian has sound knowledge in containment.
Zayn and Kris are a powerful couple truly dedicated to their kids and work. Pharmedley is a thriving business and its success down to all their hardwork and dedication. Well done ðŸ¥°ðŸ¥°
